page.title: 16 Area description 4
page.content:
With reference to the square in the middle row second from the right:
This area is mainly covered by intensive farmers.Farming is the most common way of life around it. This farming includes hop farming and arden vegetables. Woods also live in this area. Trade and Tourism do not appear to have affected this area which seems a little cut off from the noise nearby. The area is quite old with houses well looked after.Life styles are also slow and dreamy. Most people look as if they money in their pockets so I wouldn't class the area as being poor at all. The area is surrounded with many small villages with the first major town being Maidstone some 11 miles away.
